alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:25PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Onslow County through 500 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maple Hill, or 12 miles northwest of Surf City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Topsail Beach, Folkstone, Dixon, Onslow Beach, Sneads Ferry, Sea View Pier and Holly Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
